summary:
Professional and highly qualified engineering leader with a sense of responsibility and team working skills. Developed skills and gained experience regarding multidisciplinary work, which requires computer, electronics and mechatronics engineering background and knowledge. 

Ideal candidate for positions which require to take initiative, responsibility and challenge in reputed organizations that provide the best opportunities to gain high-quality work experience to develop technical and managerial skills.

The up-to-date CV is also available at: 
www.cankataykurt.com

profile_positions.description:
- Leading multidisciplinary teams and carrying the operational responsibility for the effective and efficient execution of the projects. 
- PM of the world's first Inductive Switching Test device, ADA to C++ conversion SW project and re-design of the High Voltage DC/DC converter modules.
- Successful implementation of project scheduling and resource allocation way of working in development teams. Migrated teams and projects from local project plan files to cloud based project scheduling and alignment tools.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
- Scrum Master of Electronics Development team in an Agile Release Train (ART) which consists of 10 teams, 6 projects and multiple external stakeholders (Trumpf, Prodrive, SES, Neways,...).
- Planned and executed the objectives and ensured timely delivery of the committed work
packages.
- Acted as the escalation level of the team, took actions, handled dependencies and risks, facilitated the collaboration between teams.
- Provided analysis on the progress of the projects and efficiency of the team, evaluated
bottlenecks in advance, drove continuous improvement on an organizational level.
profile_positions.title: Scrum Master, Electronics Development EUV @ ASML

profile_positions.description:
- Technical project management of the Heavy Class Unmanned Ground Vehicle (Gölge Süvari/Shadow Rider) project of Turkish Land Forces. (First official debut video: https://youtu.be/fzDoovnEeZ4 )
- Technical project management of the Health and Usage Monitoring System (HUMS) project for upcoming Far East and European contract opportunities.
- Initiating and managing R&D projects and developing systems aligned with technology roadmaps.
- Managing local and remote teams by leading design, procurement, integration and test phases.
- Planning and conducting technical reviews with the development teams and project status reviews with the project stakeholders periodically.
- Managing subcontractors and customer relations.
- Working closely with supply chain, quality assurance and business development to provide input for ongoing and upcoming projects.
profile_positions.title: R&D Special Projects Senior Leader

profile_positions.description:
- Initiated and managed the Unmanned Ground Vehicle proof-of-concept R&D project, showcased on an international expo and awarded a contract. (Short video from the field tests: https://youtu.be/SmOM-M41Uq8 )
- Managed local and remote teams to design, procure, integrate and test various systems and subsystems in demanding schedules.
- Managed local and remote mechanical, electronics and software engineering teams to design and develop a Health and Usage Monitoring System for land vehicles as the technical project manager. Seized the opportunity of testing the first prototype on an international army demonstration and proved that the product meets the requirements. While the qualification is still ongoing, the system became a part of two contract capture opportunities, in Far East and Europe.
- Planned and managed various safety critical tests, organized teams and subcontractors, managed relations with customers.
- Successfully completed the self-righting verification test of a 30 tonnes amphibious vehicle. (Short video of the tests: https://youtu.be/M_BUSBk5u7w ).
- Planned and managed the mortar firing tests from 8x8 armoured vehicles in Malaysia and Slovakia.
- Instrumented and conducted vehicle mine blast tests according to NATO AEP-55 in Turkey.
- Organized and conducted various land and water performance tests of tracked and wheeled amphibious vehicles.
profile_positions.title: R&D Test and Verification Lead Engineer

profile_positions.description:
- Planned, instrumented and conducted various noise, vibration and harshness (NVH) and environmental tests according to the MIL-STD-810.
- Led the User Qualification Tests of 8x8 armoured vehicles in Malaysia. Experienced in requirements, traceability, verification, qualification and standards.
- Led teams to design and develop various R&D projects consisting of electronics systems and software infrastructure for design verification and end user products.
- Identified and initiated Smart Cost Reduction Value Engineering studies. 120k+ USD opportunity was identified and captured for a local contracted project as of 2018. Won a recognition award for the study and the company's golden suggestion award for 2017.
profile_positions.title: R&D Test and Verification Senior Engineer

profile_positions.description:
- Proactively initiated, developed, delivered and granted government incentive for a generic emulator and user software project for armoured land vehicles after completion of successful referee reviews. Published a paper about the study in National Software Engineering Symposium; patent issued.
- Developed embedded Electronics Control Unit (ECU) software for various vehicles and emulators for subsystems.
- Developed various system control GUI software, digital dashboards of armored combat vehicles.
profile_positions.title: R&D Electronics Design Engineer

profile_positions.description:
- Assigned as a software development engineer at Aselsan to design and develop software packages for ongoing projects.
- Managed the development team of four and conducted the development process of various emulators, simulators and user software for the customer.
- Led the software development process of a Laser Warning Detection System. Developed a Marine Gyro Systems user interface and a Cannon Fire Control System emulator for the customer.
profile_positions.title: Senior Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
- Assigned as a software development engineer at Aselsan to design and develop software packages for ongoing projects.
- Managed the development team of four and conducted the development process of various emulators, simulators and user software for the customer.
- Led the software development process of a Laser Warning Detection System. Developed a Marine Gyro Systems user interface and a Cannon Fire Control System emulator for the customer.
profile_positions.title: Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
- Assigned to the R&D Department of Yıldırım Elektronik and worked on government incentive awarded projects at Middle East Technical University Technopolis.
- Developed data acquisition software from electrical machines for laboratory usage and education platform software for technical and vocational high schools.
profile_positions.title: Start-up R&D Engineer
